DataElement.preferredName: Participant Randomized Protocol Arm Assigned Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator to identify whether the participant has been assigned a randomized protocol treatment arm.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Participant Randomization Protocol Treatment Arm Assignment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity.:The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment._A specific treatment plan within a clinical trial that describes the activities a subject will be involved in as he or she progresses through the study._An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use, or for a particular time or object.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: Someone who takes part in an activity.

Property.preferredDefinition: The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment._A specific treatment plan within a clinical trial that describes the activities a subject will be involved in as he or she progresses through the study._An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use, or for a particular time or object.

Concepts.definition: The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.
A specific treatment plan within a clinical trial that describes the activities a subject will be involved in as he or she progresses through the study.
An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use, or for a particular time or object.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results or effects (does not include CTC Adverse Events) of therapeutic agents or procedures administered to the patient.

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the site participant have an assigned patient randomized to Arm B (CONCURxP) who had less than 85% adherence rate at 12 months as measured by the WiseBag?
